#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
ll cat[1002]={0};
void preprocess()
{
	cat[0]=1;
	
	for(int n=1;n<1001;n++)
	{
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	    cat[n]+=cat[i]*cat[n-i-1];
	    cat[n]%=10000;
	}
}

int main()
{
	preprocess();
	int t,n;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		if(n==0)
		cout<<"0\n";
		else if(n==1)
		cout<<"1\n";
		else
		cout<<cat[n-1]<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
